messages.subject: Life is good
messages.msgSnippet: ... Thanks. I added that line after two of my brother s died. They gave me so much in life. Their early death was a reminder to me to enjoy the good life I
messages.messageBody:
>>And Mary, I love your tagline. I need reminders (see Joyce's question
>>about changing subjects!). Yours is a good reminder.>>

Thanks. I added that line after two of my brother's died. They gave me so
much in life. Their early death was a reminder to me to enjoy the good life
I have. :o) It also helps me to remember not to be snarky online. It's hard
to be really rude and then sign off life is good.It just doesns't flow for
me.

Life is good.
~Mary
